ygData.subject: RE: More on the Plane of Fear
ygData.msgSnippet: And if the gate damage had been in the game from day one, would there be complaints?  I say far less... Should all of Norrath be available to every player from
ygData.messageBody:
And if the gate damage had been in the game from day one, would there be
complaints? I say far less...
Should all of Norrath be available to every player from the get go? I say
no...

Hill giants and griffins kill low levels too...but we have accepted that as
part of the game. If the damage gate had been there from day one, it would
have been more along the lines of "Cool! You can't even gate there and
survive until you are level xx!"

Brad stated the Plane of Fear was supposed to be hard, in the context of
hard for very high level characters.
May seem elitist, but I think the high level players will probably
appreciate this more than hate it...keeping the lower levels out so they can
focus on themselves and not having to save newbies that just wander in to
the Plane of Fear. And how does that sound? "I just wandered in to the
Plane of Fear...ho hum."

And it also proves to be an achievement of sorts, being able to warp into
the Plane of Fear and survive the shock that would kill the average person.
I am all for a Plane that causes damage when you enter it...makes it more
ominous and harsh! Is the Plane of Fear supposed to be a cake walk?

This is not a flame, I am just stating a counterpoint.


-----Original Message-----
From: Perhaps a Princess... [SMTP:sarah@...]
Sent: Friday, August 06, 1999 11:15 AM
To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] More on the Plane of Fear

From: "Perhaps a Princess..." <sarah@...>

On Fri, 6 Aug 1999, Azor wrote:

> From: "Azor" <jmaynus@...>

> Brad also talked about Plane of Fear and he's idea on how to keep
low lvl
> ppl out of it. Heres what the post on EQVault said
> "Brad also stated that he was looking into a way to keep the low
levels out
> of the Plane of Fear. Perhaps something like the gate leading to
the plane
> doing damage to those who walk through it. Thus killing any low
level player
> before he even gets a glimpse of the plane."
> Gee thats real fair, "Hhhhmmm, I wonder what this gate is?" *ZAP
kill!!!*
> I say let them in but make it harder for low lvls, just like a low
lvl
> player wouldn't want to go to Unrest and if they did it's their
fault when
> they die. Maybe put up a gate but around the gate have monster
that would
> jump low lvl players. But for the gate to hurt EVERYONE and kill
the low
> lvls to me is very unfair.

Not to mention crippling high levels that go in to fight
legitimately,
by starting them off hurt@
